values: I LOVE CHRIS HALL AND RON GONZALEZ!!

yeah, i'm lost again.
too many thoughts run through this head.
i'm scrambled, wasted lost like the dirt caught underneath your fingernail.
i wish i could've felt the wind lift me off my feet so i could see myself fail.
i know that i'll never fly, i know that i'll always be, exactly what i hate.
i'd rather lay alone in bed, with so much time to contemplate.
every action, every motion, every time your hips touch mine.
every step, every slip, every moment where we lost time.
i'll take these notes and melodies in stride.
this time, i'm making this moment and running with it blind.
i'll come to the fork in the road, where the it's the road less traveled and the road always known.
and i'll keep running straight and i'll make my own.
i'll pound my feet until their weight is like bricks and stone.
someday, somehow, i'll make my way back home.
i'll make my way up to your door step and ask myself "what should i say, what should i do?"
and i'll take a deep weazy breath, and say with all my heart, until my face turns blue...
"dear ______ ... do you know how much i adore you?"

i don't know where this came from, but i kinda like it.
it popped into my head after watching Eternal Sunshine Of The Spotless Mind.
so ... yeah.

well, yet again, i feel lost and out of place.

there's nothing left in this dead town for me.

i curse too much, i hate too much.

always something holding me back from doing or saying how i really feel, and it hurts.

i guess i'll do what i do best, sit in the corner while everyone has there fun.

i just want life to be like Lovedrug's "Paper Scars"

"fall into pairs, like to ugly fish, too rare for exstinction"

never will i be truely happy, why am i so negative.
